text: Allah ni Ajula juŵanyakwile mawunde mwangali misati jankujiona; kaneka ni jwatenjele pa Arishi (Chindanda Chaulungu). Ni alijepepesye lyuŵa ni mwesi, chilichose (mwa yalakweyi) chikwenda (mwakwendelechela) mpaka pandema jekolanjidwe. Jwalakwe jukulondesyaga ichindu (ya iwumbe Yakwe). Jugopolanya ma Ȃya kuti jenumanja nkulupilile kusyesyene yakusimangana ni M’mbuje gwenu
